description.value: Character can use their Luminen Capacitors to make a melee attack. Either a Half Action WS Test with no penalty for being unarmed or as an alternative to doing damage during a grapple. Character must then pass a Toughness Test or gain a level of Fatigue, Profile: 1d10+2xWP Bonus Energy Damage, 0 Penetration, Shock Quality.
